settings.title: Enter Password
settings.text: You can find this password next to the QR code on your KP Body Scrub postcard

KP Body Scrub is an exfoliating treatment that combines lactic acid, sunflower seed oil, perlite, and licorice root extract to minimize the appearance of KP and buff away rough patches while restoring glow and softening the skin.

Its formula contains 14% AHAs — the highest percentage of AHAs on the market.

settings.title: PERLITE
settings.text: A mineral derived from naturally occurring volcanic rock, that acts as a powerful physical exfoliant to buff away roughness and bumps for a microdermabrasion effect.

settings.title: LICORICE ROOT EXTRACT
settings.text: Derived from the licorice plant, it brightens skin discoloration and soothes redness, puffiness, and itchiness.

settings.title: LACTIC ACID
settings.text: Making up our 14% active alpha-hydroxy acids (AHAs), this chemical exfoliant dissolves excess keratin build up in the pores that causes the appearance of KP.

settings.title: SUNFLOWER SEED OIL
settings.text: A non-comedogenic oil derived from sunflower seeds, rich in vitamin E, A, and C, which deeply hydrate and protect the skin’s moisture barrier.

settings.text: Designed for both those with KP and those looking for a total skin reset, KP Body Scrub is for all skin and every body. As you massage it on, perlite smooths the top layer of your skin, while the AHAs burrow deep into your pores and remove the buildup of keratin that causes bumps.

settings.title: Ask About Their Ritual
settings.text: How do your clients take care of their body hair and skin? KP Body Scrub is an effective solution for KP, making a wonderful addition to any skincare or grooming routine.

settings.title: Evaluate Their Browsing Context
settings.text: If they’re looking at exfoliating or resurfacing treatments for their body, KP Body Scrub offers full body smoothing and polishing for rough  dry patches and bumps.

settings.title: Ask About Their Concerns
settings.text: KP Body Scrub addresses a variety of skin and body hair concerns by effectively exfoliating dead skin cells, clarifying pores for a smoother and more even complexion, and soothing redness and irritation.

settings.title: Body Hair Is Relatable
settings.text: Share your experiences with skincare and body hair to build relationships with your clients.

settings.title: How to Retail KP Body Scrub to Your Clients
Stock your studio with Fur’s KP Body Scrub

settings.text: *Must be logged into your registered furprofessionals.com wholesale account to purchase.
